skills.Name: Sword/Blunt Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 when using a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 20.5 and decreases received Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: M. Def.
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 24.

skills.Name: Shield Mastery
skills.Description: Shield Defense + 50% and Defense Rate + 85%. Additional P. Def. + 81 when equipped with Heavy Armor.

skills.Name: Tribunal
skills.Description: Call forth the holy energy surrounding you to judge your target, dealing 460 Holy Physical Damage. Reduces weapon resistance for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Gust Blade
skills.Description: Attacks nearby targets with 345 Physical Damage. Can be used while a sword/dualsword/blunt weapon is equipped. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Shield Strike
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy using a shield with 510 Physical Power. Requires a shield.

skills.Name: Spoil
skills.Description: Frustrates the enemy, causing 6600 Power to provoke the enemy to attack.

skills.Name: Spoil Festival
skills.Description: Spoil your target and all enemies around them, frustrating them crazy nuts and drawing attention to you.

skills.Name: Energetic Yell
skills.Description: Yell with energetic vigor, aggravating the target for 4000 Power and regains 25%% MP.

skills.Name: Aggression Aura
skills.Description: Provokes nearby enemies to attack with 4544 Power.

skills.Name: Shield Impact
skills.Description: Attacks the selected target with 100 power added to P. Atk. and inflicts Stun for 5 seconds. Requires a shield.

skills.Name: Repair Armor
skills.Description: Repair broken armor, restoring 40 HP per second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Disrupting Smash
skills.Description: Smash your weapon into the target disrupting their spell casting and reducing their casting speed by 23%% for 8 seconds.

skills.Name: Crystallize
skills.Description: Makes C-grade Crystallization possible.

skills.Name: Ultimate Defense
skills.Description: For 30 seconds., increases P. Def. by 1800, M. Def. by 1620, and Buff-canceling Attack Resistance by 80%, and restricts movement.

skills.Name: Noble Sacrifice
skills.Description: For 10 seconds, receives 60% of the damage inflicted to the party member.

skills.Name: Spike
skills.Description: Add spikes to a melee weapon greatly increasing its combat abilities. Increases P. Atk. by 15% and P. Skill Damage by 30% for 15 seconds.

skills.Description: Increases party member's P. Atk. by 3% and P. Def. by 3% for 20 minutes.

skills.Description: Restring the targets bow with special dwarven thread found only in the Dwarven Mountains of Maphr. Increases P. Atk. by $s1 and P. Skill Damage by $s2 for 15 seconds.

skills.Description: Summons a siege weapon. Requires 180 C-grade Crystals.
